how to start.intro: Sabse pehle decide karo tum kya share karna chahte ho – tech, vlog, education ya kuch aur.
steps: Phone se start karo – budget friendly
Video banao aur edit karo CapCut ya VN se

choose niche.intro: Ek strong niche help karta hai loyal audience banane me.
steps: Usme content available hai kya check karo
Long-term sustain ho payega kya socho
Competition dekho – too much toh avoid karo
